reviewText: Dance your way back to his HEART!

This is a very well made program, and very informative. The quality is really good. The same as watching it on DVD, and you actually learn something in a very tasteful presentation. Intimacy Spa - Sensual Strip Dance DVD & CD set This is not for people who are looking for porn on amazon, but for couples, and particularly women, who would like to learn the art of stripping. Highly recommended.
what a waste of money. It wasn't what I thought it would be it not something i would ever buy or watch again.

Haha.  What I mean is I bought this for my wife along with the Pole Dancing DVD from the same series.  I was surprised at how much she has enjoyed the art of sexy dancing.  And I get to be the audience.  We have renewed the playfulness in our relationship through programs like this.  She doesn't like porn, but this series is instructional mixed with romantic... it's perfect for us.
